email.title: Freshers' Handbook 2020
email.text:
We've just released our 2020 Freshers' Handbook!
It contains lots of helpful tips about how to get started with studying at Imperial, what events we've got coming up for you and information about our sponsors.
You can find it [on issuu](https://issuu.com/docsoc/docs/freshers_handbook_2020) and attached to this email.
